document.docAuthor: Pacheco-Chaves, Bernald, Cordeiro, Isabelle Da Rocha Silva, Moreira, Felipe Ferraz Figueiredo & Springer, Monika
document.masterDocTitle: The water striders (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Gerridae) of Costa Rica: new species, checklist, and new records

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: The water striders (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Gerridae) of Costa Rica: new species, checklist, and new records

subSubSection.paragraph:
Previously recorded from Costa Rica ( Guanacaste , Puntarenas , and San José provinces),
Panama
, and Colombia ( Esaki 1926b ; Hungerford 1937 , 1939 ; Kuitert 1942 ; Wheelwright & Wilkinson 1985 ;
Manzano et al. 1995
; Polhemus & Polhemus 1995 ; Molano et al. 2008; Posso & González 2008 ). It is herein reported for the first time from Alajuela , Heredia , and Limón provinces. As are other species of
Potamobates
,
P. tridentatus
is found on the riffle areas of lotic habitats along the Atlantic and Pacific slopes of Costa Rica , up to 700 m a.s.l.
